name: Cardinal
tagline: A New Type of Digital Agency
description: We don’t do things for the sake of doing them. We know that our clients engage our strategists, developers, and designers in order to get amazing results. That’s why working with Cardinal means you get an integrated approach that considers creative solutions and understands the technology behind achieving meaningful change. Cardinal is more than a design agency or development shop catering to specialty and mass markets, we’re the trusted partners in your business success.
